website_summaries.verdict: Everything a newcomer needs to begin shooting quality video, and the lights themselves are easily the best part of this kit.
pros: Includes 2 softbox windows, 2 umbrellas, 3 backdrops, and a variety of other essential pieces
cons: The backdrops feel thin and flimsy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The lights are awesome, but everything else is horrible quality. The back drops are made of weird materials and the bars are so flimsy they don't even hold up the material. I DO NOT RECCOMEND THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner equipment
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner photographer so I didn’t want to invest a ton of money in equipment I really don’t know how to use properly yet. I have to say this purchase has exceeded expectation. The backdrops are better quality than I expected and so far the lighting equipment works fine. My only problem was a broken bulb in shipment, but the seller ordered a replacement for me.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about this kit after reading some negative reviews, but I love it! Everything was packaged well, all bulbs arrived safely, it's easy to set up and use, and it looks great. Perfect for beginners. I would recommend investing in weighted bags to keep everything in place for any outdoor use or for indoor use when there is a crowd, because the stands are lightweight. My only "con" about this package is that the gear bag is pretty flimsy and seems likely to break soon after only a couple of uses. I will be getting a replacement gear bag and recommend the same for others. Otherwise, this is a great kit. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: I loved everything on this package
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything on this package, it came with everything in the picture. Perfect if you want to start with your own studio. And you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: thalia

customer_reviews.title: Solid value for backgrounds and lights
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical after reading some reviews but this set is great for the money. The backgrounds are a decent fabric, I was able to steam out wrinkles and creases. The background frame is pretty solid and easy to put together and adjust. The lights work really well and are also easy to set up/take down and adjust. Overall, I'm glad I bought this set - it works perfectly for my personal (non-professional) needs at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: beecee

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Man. This thing is awesome. I actually set it up in about 15 minutes. I thought it was going to be much more of a hassle. The poles are typical Chinese poles but the whole kit is a lot of fun and exactly what I needed for amateur photos of my family. Comes with a bag that holds everything, bag is also cheap, but it gets the job done. I am incredibly happy with this little set.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, mainly for online gaming/ streaming videos, etc.. I intend to occasionally use it for taking pictures of my daughter on holidays/ hobbie photo shoots at home. This kit is much better than I expected. The screen material is very nice. Everything seems to be of decent quality, especially considering the price. We're very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: gary morris

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Did not like the fact that a used white sheet was given to me. There was marks all over my white sheet. You can tell it was used before. The order came fast. The stand for the sheets is a bit flimsy but it does the job. They lights are amazingly great. Altogether the set up is very impressive. The price was great for all that you get. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlin

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beginner set up. Customer service was great. When I received it the bulb was broke I contacted the seller and they sent me bulbs right away. I’m very satisfied and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Real Nice for Price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set for the price. Background clothes are heavy duty and I couldn't get the fold creases out, but I take care of that with photo program. I'm real happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Torn Soft Boxes
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality only thing is the both soft boxes were torn when I got them and one of the umbrellas was bent to the point I couldn’t use it
customer_reviews.author: Kam M.

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the clips
customer_reviews.text: This was a great starter set for us to do our before and after pictures. But the clips are crap. One cracked putting the curtain together. The other ones broke over the next week. We weren't even using the room and we would hear one hit the floor. The last two gave up this morning and the whole curtain fell to the floor. Please change the clips.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected and great professional packaging. This is an amazing deal for the value. Brings everything that’s on the description and very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great starter lighting studio
customer_reviews.text: I was needing some studio lighting and was thinking about the bare minimal s, but decided that why not get a full system for a little more. This is a great system for starting out. Yes, in time i will need something more, but the studio is great for me at this stage. I would recommend this as a great starter. Cant go wrong with the price. Also received the package within a week.
customer_reviews.author: salome gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Everything came in one piece and was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Nae' Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good buy. Easy to set up..great lights.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use, but I wish the backdrops were a bit wider, but that is a personal preference for me. One of my bulbs arrived shattered but the I contacted the manufacturer and received a replacement no questions asked. Overall I am pretty happy
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT M MCGILVRAY

customer_reviews.title: Shocking lightbulbs
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to put it all together yet because I’m too scared to touch anything. Please refrain from putting the lightbulbs in the styrofoam boxes as it shocked me when I was pulling it out and it frightened me! Other than that the whole setup is pretty awesome. Excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey cofran

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Hi I ordered this product for my live fb live feeds and I love it. The only down side for me was the backdrops. I don't like the quality, look and feel of the materials. But other than the backdrops I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marva

customer_reviews.title: damaged part
customer_reviews.text: I really like the entire kit/set except when I set it up one of the light bulbs does not work. It's definitely the bulb. How can I get that replaced as it should be able to be returned for a working light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Bang for your buck! I love mine. Great for beginners. DIY. Home videos. Portraits. Content creators
customer_reviews.author: Anna 💅🏼

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Got here like lightening, I couldn't believe it, everything seems to be in tact. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: izzi

customer_reviews.title: Photo studio done right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners and the price is very reasonable. Everything you need to get started
customer_reviews.author: George R Rodriguez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love everything. The only thing that could be improved is the backdrops themselves are a tad see through
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Boulos

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love it . Was easy to setup and turned out perfect will buy again ..
customer_reviews.author: Mzsimz

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product & an even BETTER price! This is worth the price & some!
customer_reviews.author: Bre B

customer_reviews.title: Backdrop stand is Not for standing portraits. Too short
customer_reviews.text: The stand is too short for standing portraits. Model is 5’9. The stand is about 5-11 to 6 feet.
customer_reviews.author: LaQuisha M.

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for this price
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect, but it's good enough for me. Cons: the lamps has very short wires.
customer_reviews.author: Alexey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - You are better off with a regular lamp from the hardware store
customer_reviews.text: I''m a photographer and i bought this kit because im out of town and i needed something cheap for a quick and easy photo shoot. i knew for the price the quality was going to be bad. but i didn't care as long as it worked. But: _It only came with 2 170w light bulbs. which is not what is listed in the description. _It doesn't include the umbrellas or the stands. it only comes with the soft boxes and 2 stands. _the brightness of the light is so low that any light in the room will shine brighter than this. this is completely useless. even for beginners or hobbyists. don't buy this product. it's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Albó

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect studio for beginners and the seller was very responsive when we got troubles with the carrier
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Calderon

product_meta.title: Kshioe 1700W 5500K Umbrellas Softbox Continuous Lighting Kit with Backdrop Support System for Photo Studio Product, Portrait and Video Shoot Photography
feature_bullets: Package List: 【2】 50x70cm softbox window + 【2】33"/84cm diameter umbrella+【4】 26-79 inch extendable steel stand for softbox and umbrella+【4】85W photography bulb+【2】Switch for umbrella+【3】2x 3M Polyster backdrop cloth (Black,White and Green)+【2】68-200cm extendable steel stand for background +【4】75cm steel tube for flexible background width+【1】Carrying bag +【6】Clamps

Full set: Good first starter kit for professional/home studio. Include everything basic you need to start. Easy to set up and use. Enjoy your worry-free 1 YEAR warranty and Kshioe sincerely always customer service. If you have any question about our product, please contact our customer service and we will reply in 24 hours.

Upgraded & Professional Backdrops: Upgrade backdrop are made of 100% polyster. Compared to cotton cloth, which is more soft and wrinkle resistant. It is machine washable and can be irond.Professional Lightweight & duarable support system, bulit with Aluminum Alloy Construction. Good Flexibility with Width (5 ft.–10 ft.) & Height (2.3 ft.–6.6 ft.)

2 Softbox: Kshioe softbox lighting kit, 50x70cm continuous lighting soft box with stand, min 26inch, maximum 79inch, with E27 bulb holder, perfect for portrait, costume, furnishing, naturally soften light stream and remove shadow to make perfect shooting

2 Umbrella: Kshioe 33 inch diameter lighting umbrellas diffuse light, weaken shadows, make model portrait and product shooting softer and more delicate, get ideal lighting effect by using with common softbox or flash.Umbrella head can be 180° adjusted supply softer light for specific corner .
